property.name: fetcher.server.delay
property.description: The number of seconds the fetcher will delay between successive requests to the same server.

property.name: fetcher.verbose
property.description: If true, fetcher will log more verbosely.

property.name: db.update.max.inlinks
property.description: Maximum number of inlinks to take into account when updating a URL score in the crawlDB. Only the best scoring inlinks are kept.
